main event: An object brighter than a full moon was observed traveling due east for 10 minutes, resembling a satellite.
interesting points: The object was traveling at about the speed of a jet plane while being very close to the ground., The object would disappear behind clouds and then reappear., Witnesses described the light of the object as very bright, similar to a full moon., The report was submitted by a Federal Government employee who had witnessed aerial objects before., There were claims of unusual aerial activity in the area with prior sightings in 1952, 1953, and 1957.
sighted object: a bright object resembling a satellite
witness description: Federal Government employees observing the object.
